job_tasks.phrase: Als generalist beschik jij over actuele kennis en kunde van zowel front end als back end.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase indicates a requirement for traditional full-stack development skills, covering both front-end and back-end development, which falls under general software engineering.

job_tasks.phrase: In je rol als full stack AI developer fungeer je als de verbinder tussen de domeinexperts uit de business lines en afdelingen enerzijds en ons team van AI developers.
job_tasks.justification: This describes the role of bridging the gap between business domain experts and the AI development team, which is a key aspect of understanding business needs and aligning technical solutions.

job_tasks.phrase: Samen met de ingenieurs en adviseurs signaleer je kansen voor het inzetten van AI, breng je vragen en wensen in kaart en analyseer je processen.
job_tasks.justification: This task involves identifying opportunities for AI deployment, understanding business requirements ('vragen en wensen'), and analyzing processes, all of which relate to understanding the business context and translating it into technical needs.

job_tasks.phrase: Deze bevindingen zet je vervolgens om in passende AI-applicaties met technieken als Retrieval Augmented Generation (RAG) en Agentic Frameworks.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase explicitly mentions the use of Retrieval Augmented Generation (RAG) and Agentic Frameworks, which are core components of modern GenAI development.

job_tasks.phrase: De afdeling is gericht op het ondersteunen bij de veranderopgaven van de organisatie en op het optimaliseren van de informatievoorziening aan de gebruikers.
job_tasks.justification: This describes the department's focus on supporting organizational change and optimizing information provision to users, which implies building and integrating systems to achieve these goals.

job_tasks.phrase: De afdeling is daarnaast verantwoordelijk voor integraal projectmanagement binnen de bedrijfsvoering, business intelligence en data-analyse en het implementeren van het werken onder architectuur.
job_tasks.justification: This mentions responsibilities like project management, business intelligence, data analysis, and implementing architectural work, which are all related to the broader software development and integration lifecycle.

soft_skills.phrase: In je rol als full stack AI developer fungeer je als de verbinder tussen de domeinexperts uit de business lines en afdelingen enerzijds en ons team van AI developers.
soft_skills.justification: This highlights the role of acting as a connector between different groups, which is a key communication and collaboration skill.

soft_skills.phrase: Als generalist beschik jij over actuele kennis en kunde van zowel front end als back end. En ben je op de hoogte van de laatste ontwikkelingen en trends op het gebied van AI.
soft_skills.justification: This emphasizes staying up-to-date with the latest developments and trends in AI, indicating a need for continuous learning and adaptability.

profile.rationale: The job ad explicitly mentions 'generatieve AI' and specific GenAI techniques like 'Retrieval Augmented Generation (RAG)' and 'Agentic Frameworks' (Macro-Category B tasks). It also requires traditional full-stack development skills (front-end and back-end) and acting as a connector between business and AI teams (Macro-Category A and Business Understanding tasks). This balance of core software engineering with specific GenAI specialization, without a strong emphasis on traditional ML, points to the 'Core GenAI Engineer' profile.

confidence.reasoning: The job ad clearly specifies GenAI technologies and the need for both front-end and back-end skills. The role of connecting business and AI teams is also well-defined. While it could be slightly more detailed on the specific AI models or the depth of front-end/back-end work, the core requirements are sufficiently clear to assign a profile with high confidence.
